Summary: Bright red light zigzagged and zoomed away at very high speed
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Brooklyn Park
There were no other sightings in Brooklyn Park on or around September 19th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were out on our balcony smoking a cigarette. We live next to Crystal Airport and we know the difference from plane and helicopter. We saw a red air craft that zig zagged left to right in and incredible speed. The first movements short, then they became longer distant. I hope someone else saw this also. Please contact me. What I saw affected me in a big way.
